title: Walnut banana bread pudding
ingredients: ['120g butter, divided', '1 (450g) loaf day-old French bread, cut into 2cm cubes', '120g chopped walnuts', '4 eggs', '250ml double cream', '1 (400ml) tin sweetened condensed milk', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '220g soft brown sugar', '4 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 pinch salt', '4 very ripe bananas, mashed']
